title: Incorrect version of angular-resource module
description:
It seems an incorrect version of the angular-resource library crept in, which should be resolved. 

This causes no issues, unless we try to use 1.3.x features on angular-resource, when it gets confusing, because we're using 1.3.8 Angular.

FTR: angular-resource provides an API for interacting with RESTful web services, and substantially reduces the amount of boilerplate code required to manage these services.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
